qas.question: How many institutes of technology in the Netherlands have converted into full-fledged universities in the past few decades?
How many Technical Universities are there in the Netherlands today?

context: In the Netherlands, <a0_0>four<a0_0/> former institutes of technology have become universities over the past decades. These are the current <a1_0>three<a1_0/> Technical Universities (at Delft, Eindhoven and Enschede), plus the former agricultural institute in Wageningen. A list of all hogescholen in the Netherlands, including some which might be called polytechnics, can be found here.
